Package gw.api.filters

Interface IQueryFilter

All Superinterfaces:
IFilter
All Known Subinterfaces:
IQueryAndBeanFilter, StandardQueryFilters.StandardQueryFilter
All Known Implementing Classes:
ActivityFilter, ActivityNoteFilter, ActivityPatternFilterSet.CategoryFilter, AssignedActivitiesFilter, ClaimInfoSecurityFilter, ClaimSecurityFilter, CommonActivitiesFilter, CompositionFilter, CoreFilters.AllFilter, CoreFilters.CompareNDays, CoreFilters.CreatedInLastBusinessWeek, CoreFilters.CreatedInLastNDays, CoreFilters.CreatedMoreThanNDays, CoreFilters.DateDueInNextNDays, CoreFilters.DateInLastBusinessWeek, CoreFilters.DateInLastNDays, CoreFilters.DateMoreThanNDays, CoreFilters.DaysBase, CoreFilters.Equals, CoreFilters.In, CoreFilters.NotEquals, DecentralizedAdminActivityPatternFilter, DecentralizedAdminFilter, DecentralizedAdminRoleFilter, DocumentFilter, ExposureFilter, GroupSecurityZoneFilter, NoPermissionsQueryFilter, NoteFilter, ServiceRequestsInternalFilter, StandardQueryFilter, TransactionFilter, UnverifiedPolicySecurityFilter, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllActive, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllErrors, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllFailures, WorkQueueInfoPage.AllProblems
public interface IQueryFilter extends IFilter
Filter for queries

It is rare to implement this interface directly, prefer StandardQueryFilter which automatically handles tricky cases such as group queries (for example unions and intersections)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IQuery
    filterQuery(IQuery original)
    Updates the query to filter out particular results.

  • Method Details

    • filterQuery

      IQuery filterQuery(IQuery original)
      Updates the query to filter out particular results. May update the query in place or create a new, more restricted, query
      Parameters:
      original - the query to be filtered
      Returns:
      either the updated original query or a new query
